name: types-slot-cars
description: TypeScript definitions and Zod schemas for slot-cars

scripts.check-git-status: bash -c 'if [[ $(git status --porcelain) ]]; then echo "Error: Working directory not clean. Commit changes first."; exit 1; fi && if [[ $(git log --branches --not --remotes) ]]; then echo "Error: You have unpushed commits. Push to remote first."; exit 1; fi'
scripts.publish:patch: npm run check-git-status && bun run build && standard-version --release-as patch && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm run check-git-status && bun run build && standard-version --release-as minor && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm run check-git-status && bun run build && standard-version --release-as major && npm publish
